CustomField.description: US-0007824 - EU Advertising CPM Calculator US-0009260 - [Ads 2020] OLI Trigger to QLI/AP, Fields & Syncing - will be the same for TKP_net_net_net__c
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "Fix Price") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPD") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "ServiceFee") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "Subscription") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPC") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPO") || ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, "CPA") , ROUND( Amount_Net2eBay__c / Quantity ,2) , ROUND( Amount_Net2eBay__c / (Quantity/1000) ,2) )
CustomField.label: CPM Net2Ebay
